Keywords: Champions , Codex , Defenders , Monster , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Bobby Drake
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
SYMBIOTIC FUSION: Plasticity, Super Senses. // If Venom Iceman is within 4 squares and line of fire of an opposing character, he can't be targeted by range attacks.
ALIEN ICE WALL: Barrier. Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 1 marker. // Opposing characters adjacent to one or more of Venom Iceman's Barrier markers must roll for break away if they don't already need to.
ICEBALL BLAST: Incapacitate, KNOCKBACK. // When Venom Iceman destroys a square of blocking terrain, after resolutions deal 1 damage to each opposing character adjacent to that square.

January 2, 2022
tidge
I agree, one purpose of ALIEN ICE WALL and ICEBALL BLAST is so that Venom Iceman can create a square of blocking terrain and then destroy it to deal damage without having to make attacks against figures. It's not a GREAT trick (considering damage reducers) but it is a rather unique one.
December 21, 2021
Ultimate2099
Icewall Blast works like a range poison. Free barrier 1 blocking next to targets then destroy it to deal 1 i without needing to roll. Kind of nifty.
December 13, 2021

I'm wondering if you need to roll for plasticity though - since the way it's worded: "Opposing characters adjacent to one or more of Venom Iceman's Barrier markers must roll for break away if they don't already need to." Means that you need to roll for standard breakaway since it doesn't say "must roll for breakaway as if they are adjacent to venom..."
December 8, 2021
Goop
The free barrier marker combos perfectly with the Symbiotic Fusion trait. Forcing your opponents to constantly have to breakaway will be a pain for them. Seems good for his cost.
